content:
Below, are the list of tracker items up for block vote during the EITHER The Cologne WGM (Time permitting) or the next OO call following the WGM. Please review the dispositions at your earliest convenience. If you do not agree with the proposed resolution for an item, please let me know via email or here on Zulip

### Comment Submitters

- Benjamin Flessner
- Danielle Friend
- Eric Haas
- Floyd Eisenberg
- Scott
Robertson

### Line Items

16035
Value+set+expansion+missing+descriptions (<span style="color:blue">Scott
Robertson</span>) Considered - Question
Answered
15939
DeviceRequest+fails+to+allow+reason+for+not+requesting
(<span style="color:blue">Floyd Eisenberg</span>) In Person Not
Persuasive
15940
ServiceRequest+needs+capability+to+indicate+notDoneReason
(<span style="color:blue">Floyd Eisenberg</span>) In Person Not
Persuasive
15946
DeviceRequest+intent+should+be+a+code (<span style="color:blue">Benjamin
Flessner</span>)
Persuasive
15954
change+intent+type+from+CodeableConcept+to+code
(<span style="color:blue">Eric Haas</span>)
Persuasive
15974
Observation+Operations+should+not+be+normative+in+R4
(<span style="color:blue">Danielle Friend</span>)
Persuasive
15938
DeviceUseStatement+fails+to+accommodate+reasons+not+done+to+support+workflow
(<span style="color:blue">Floyd Eisenberg</span>) In Person
Persuasive with
Mod
15971
Ability+to+address+anatomical+approach+site+for+procedures+and+devices
(<span style="color:blue">Floyd Eisenberg</span>) In Person
(sorry about the markup - Zulip markdown is primitive- :-()
This Block is being moved forward to this week's OO meeting.
